A client suspects some of their tests depend on the order of test execution and 
wants to find out which one. Is there any way to cause all the tests in the 
entire test suite (not just in one class) to be run in a different order? 
Ideally, I'd like to run them in reverse order using a command line switch. 
Failing that, what single place in the code base could I change to affect this? 
(In JUnit 3.x, one could override a method (runBare?) in the test runner to 
iterate through the collection of sub-tests in reverse order.)

Thanks,

Gerard
